original_text:
Concerning Edom:
This is what the Lord Almighty says:
“Is there no longer wisdom in Teman?
    Has counsel perished from the prudent?
    Has their wisdom decayed?
korean_text: 에돔에 대한 말씀이라 만군의 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 데만에 다시는 지혜가 없게 되었느냐 명철한 자에게 책략이 끊어졌느냐 그들의 지혜가 없어졌느냐

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord Almighty says:
Is there no longer wisdom in Teman?
Has counsel perished from the prudent?
